page.title: 07SHOPPING IN CLOWNE
page.content: CLOWNE HAS A WIDE RANGE OF SHOPS MOST BEING LOCATED IN THE NORTH ST.,MILL ST.,AND HIGH ST.,AREAS.THE TWO LARGEST SUPERMARKETS ARE FOUND HERE.A THIRD SUPERMARKET IS FOUND ON ONE OF THE COUNCIL ESTATES. CLOWNE IS WELL SERVED FOR SHOPS SELLING FRESH FOOD.THERE ARE 5 BUTCHERS,3 GREENGROCERS AND 3 BAKERS ALL OF WHOM BAKE THEIR OWN BREAD.IN ADDITION THERE ARE NUMEROUS GENERAL DEALERS. THERE IS LESS CHOICE FOR CLOTHING AND FURNITURE.THERE BEING 3 SMALL CLOTHING SHOPS,ONE LARGER SHOP AND ONE SHOE SHOP.THERE IS ONE QUITE LARGE FURNITURE SHOP AND TWO SELLING ELECTRICAL GOODS. ALSO THERE ARE TWO CHEMISTS.AMONGST THE OTHERS THERE IS A RECENTLY OPENED GUN SHOP,A SPECIALIST CYCLE SHOP,AN ANGLING SHOP AND 3 D.I.Y. SHOPS.
